Name: Khursanoi
description:
Khursanoi is a happy resident of the Kumsangir region, Tajikistan. She is 32 years old, married and a caring mother of her 2 young children, ages 4 and 6. She works as a seller in a local shop and knows how to do her job well.

She also is a happy and talented farmer. She has grown green plants for more than five years. She works with these plants in her own yard. Khursanoi would like to begin spring sowing. She has decided to build a greenhouse (hotbed) and grow her plants there. She needs to purchase building materials in order to build the greenhouse.

She hopes to have your help and kindness.
